text: We have a limited beta in the *Workflows* tool right now which brings a new *menu style navigation* with support for *keyboard shortcuts*! This will allow us to better optimize our use of space and help you all work more quickly and efficiency. These two changes will also create a more accessible navigation system for all.  If this is something you or your team would like check out early (and give feedback on) you can join the beta by submitting *<https://8-04.na1.hs-sales-engage.com/Ctc/41+23284/8-04/JkM2-6qcW6N1vHY6lZ3m0W6GZpBZ6RskPgW5CxlcC71_dwZN2l1S9RfRNsvW1Dbv1Q1YvDb3W8ybkdx2p-XwBW4jqQKZ3V7wSzW3KwdW77xzzqdN7G2LC6r8b_CMnDqzPmQBtGW8L3xFg3RMl20W8mhG9H8BLV7QW3mgFbT55kcSnW4YB1NM6G6WpGW5Cch-h3PbY1JW3znv2V8YrzHJW25d2WL74yzgmW4KJP0y1BStJ5W7RgWv-68VCRFW66YV6l658dNwVnrczP8HdhPxW7N75Jn1QvTh8W6TDzSw97F2N2f7c7Fwg04|this form>* :orange_heart:
